sentence.Network_en: The necromancer hurls a bolt of dark energies against his enemies.
sentence.Network_cn: 亡灵法师向对手射出一道带着黑暗能量的影束.

sentence.Network_en: The necromancer tried to keep the anticipation out of her voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 死灵法师尽量让自己的声音不带期待.

sentence.Network_en: All Necromancer pets now play a spawn animation when they are summoned.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在所有的死灵宠物发挥产卵动画当他们被传唤.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 就是死灵法师（Necromancer），位于天灾的午夜酒馆，是DotA中几大智力后期DPS之一。希望这些对你有帮助~呵呵
亡灵巫师（necromancer）（Necromancer）　　死亡族魔法英雄，初始技能是基础死亡魔法和基础神秘。巫师（Sorcerer）　　庇护所魔法英雄，初始技能 …
巫师(Necromancers)的终极武器StrokeofDeath:　　召唤任意一只golems，施放一次bonespirit，然后死亡，等到复活之后输入THEDAR…
亡灵法师（NECROMANCER），召唤类的技能，没什么大意思。野蛮人（BARBARIAN），近身DPS，由于这游戏升级很困难，所以 …

list.abs: With this ritual , the necromancer revives a Mound King and binds him to his service ., 通过这个仪式魔法 , 亡灵巫师复活一个坟丘之王并使其为自己服务.
with this ritual , the necromancer revives a Bane Lord , an ancient hero serving the Lord of the Unerworld .通过这个仪式，亡灵巫师复苏一个灾殃之主。
penny can only be holding necromancer potions ,佩妮手上只能有巫师毒药
He a monster and a necromancer !, 他是个怪物 , 是一个巫师!
She had once been a living necromancer , and she took orders from no one ., 她曾是有生命的巫师 , 无人可以命令她.

means.word_mean: 1. one who practices magic or sorcery
2. one who practices divination by conjuring up the dead
